mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_app_attention(attention_time, slaver_id, master_id) SELECT NOW() AS attention_time, u.id AS slaver_id ,#{unitId} AS master_id FROM t_app_user u WHERE u.role_id = 2 AND u.test_flag = 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM t_app_attention WHERE master_id = #{unitId} AND slaver_id = u.id) GROUP BY u.id LIMIT #{fans}
